com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

Interface AdvisedProxyFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingAdvisedProxyFactory

    public interface AdvisedProxyFactory

    Factory for creating advice-woven AbstractProxy instances. This factory will use the most appropriate AbstractProxy implementation for the Object being proxied. If possible, a JdkDynamicProxy will be used to avoid bytecode instrumentation. Otherwise, a DexMakerProxy will be used.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/14/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractProxy createProxy(android.content.Context context, java.lang.Object object, Pointcut pointcut)
      Creates a new AbstractProxy for the given Object.

    • Method Detail

      • createProxy

        AbstractProxy createProxy(android.content.Context context,
                        java.lang.Object object,
                        Pointcut pointcut)
        Creates a new AbstractProxy for the given Object.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context used to retrieve the DEX bytecode cache if it's needed
        object - the Object to proxy
        pointcut - the Pointcut containing advice
        Returns:
        AbstractProxy
